title: Vance visits Armenia, Azerbaijan as Trump eyes deals in Russia’s sphere
summary_full: The vice president’s historic trip illustrates Trump’s transactional diplomacy and willingness to use economic muscle to elbow out rivals such as Russia and Iran.
summary_public: The vice president’s historic trip illustrates Trump’s transactional diplomacy and willingness to use economic muscle to elbow out rivals such as Russia and Iran.
